items.text: The idea to develop CASH FLASH is born
The project CASH FLASH is created
Start of the possibility of exchanging the coin on the main Exchange
Is possible to buy in shops with CASH FLASH coin
CASH FLASH Anti Counterfeit system is up and running

what.title:
What's
Cash Flash
what.sub: We are creating the first project with its real Certified and Guaranteed Marketplace.
what.text: The Cash Flash project was born with the intent to create a series of systems for both the customer and companies, incorporated in the first marketplace where it will be possible to buy everything in cryptocurrency. All stores will be able to use it as a means of payment with a dedicated POS. Furthermore, through Cash Flash Technology it will be possible to trace the products and counteract their counterfeiting.

paper.title: White Paper
paper.sub: Official company program viewable and downloadable in pdf, choose the language most convenient to you:
paper.text: Terms of service are rules by which you must agree to abide by to use a service. The terms of service may also simply be a disclaimer, particularly regarding the use of the websites.

team.title: Team
team.text: Cash Flash, unlike other projects in the sector, wants to give the opportunity to all the most competent people to be part of our team, with the aim of welcoming the project, excellences of all nations, to become a global project . Cash Flash was born from the entrepreneurial idea of Andrea Cerato, who shares the vision of a project focused on the opportunity to create a real ecosystem in the world of cryptocurrencies. Through the blockchain, new services are created both for the customer and for the company, creating a shorter and more performing supply chain.

items.title: Andrea CERATO
items.description: 36 years old Italian from Verona, specialized in civil and industrial electronics, computer programming, Specialized and experienced has the highest levels in development and programming security in payment systems, including both banking and military software, also specializing in algorithms for military use. In 2006 he created Gray Screen, an efficient encryption system that has never been hacked. Specialized in anti-fraud security systems, such as ATM and Pos with advanced technologies, such as tamper evident optical sensors, smart microphones and sensors. Creator of the former self-control systems with gsm data modules for driving from remote on multiple industrial machinery, such as washing machines, alarms, emergency sensors, water flooding, gas leaks, etc .. Consultant in government negotiations with various foreign states and top secret military entities, contract negotiations for bridges, highways, schools, aqueducts, churches and fiber optics in underdeveloped countries and finally negotiations for the sales of mines of gold, diamond and oil fields. Through his knowledge, he knows payment methods for cash flow management, knows widely the need and the shortcomings of the world financial system, in 2019 he decides to found Cash Flash, wanting to contribute with all its know-how to create a cryptocurrency and related blockchain to improve the current state of world marketing.

0.title: Computer programming
0.text: Faculty of Cybernetics, University of Bucharest

3.title: Security systems development
3.text: Creating anti-fraud systems, For ATM security, POS

items.title: Roberto BARON
items.description: 33 years of Noventa Vicentina. Graduated as an electronic expert, entrepreneur since 2004 he has embarked on the IT path aimed at the security of multinational companies, concerning industrial espionage and advanced alarms. This activity led him to London, where he still lives today, successfully managing IT security companies. Passionate about crypto currencies since 2015, he wants to participate in creating an innovative service to be used every day for each commercial sector, facilitating its customers but also helping to improve families in daily use.

items.title: Giancarlo GIACOMELLI
items.description: BORN IN VERONA ITALY ON AUGUST 30, 1955 I.T.I.S. graduate State Industrial Technical Institute Electrotechnical section; Specialized in Sales and Marketing Techniques; Selection, training and motivation of human resources in the commercial field; Entrepreneurial management in various commercial companies. This training was developed in the companies for which he carried out professional activity, and by attending organized study sessions by specialized structures, such as the “Mario Silvano” of Milan and the “Roberto Re” of Milan. Registered in the C.C.I.A.A. of Verona role of commercial agents, in addition to the related pension supplementary E.N.A.S.A.R.C.O. PREVIOUS EMPLOYMENT 1st November 2009- 31st January 2019. Mint services of the Italian State Personal requirements are undoubtedly the great ability to adapt to different roles in the professional field.

items.title: Roberto PISA
items.description: 58 years old, born in New York to an English mother and an Italian father, he lived for over two years in New York, London, Athens, Beijing, Rome, Strasbourg, Brussels and in the United States (Hendersonville NC- Fairfield CT). He obtained French Maurità (Bac Mathematics section), a degree from Bocconi University in Political Economy, an MBA while working at the University of Leuven (B), a PIM diploma from the HEC in Paris.In 2013 he founded the CL Partners company, which operates as Advisory in operational and financial restructuring projects, for Banks, Funds or industrial companies.Previously he worked for 7 years in one of the major European PE funds as Senior Partner, where he managed the restructuring of portfolio companies and where he followed some investment initiatives. He also worked for several industrial companies for 22 years and was, among other things, President and CEO of GE Lighting Systems, Chief Executive Officer of Pirelli SpA, CEO of Euralcom, CRO of the Fiat Group, CEO of Sirti SpA.Early in his career, he worked for McKinsey & Co.Known languages: Italian, English and French.

items.title: Carlo Antonio MAZZOLLA
items.description: Independent financial advisor from Milan. Born in Saronno in 1976, Graduated in Business and Economics, Graduated from Upsala College in East Orange, N.J.-USA. He has worked with major international investment banks and has distinguished himself in the protection of the saver.
